metadata.synopsis: One liner for Gondian Worker10 (Clore Falson) for after saving the Gondians. She is deeply traumatised and thinks the player isn't real.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen debug bookSet flag for haivng saved prisonersGo to -1937; 0; 443Kill enemeisdisarm all kill switches that join combatClick on Clore Falson

0.speaker: Gondian Clore Falson
0.text: The Titan will kill you. It will kill us all.
0.context: NodeContext: traumatised, out of it, almost like she's in her own world. Someone who has been hurt so badly that she's almost on another world (the titan is a huge, terrifying steel watcher in the other room - she saw it kill a number of her friends)

1.speaker: Gondian Clore Falson
1.text: The others will think you're real, but I know the truth. No one leaves the Foundry. No one defies Lord Gortash.
1.context: NodeContext: scared, not meeting players eyes, hands over face

2.speaker: Gondian Clore Falson
2.text: No - you're not here. It's a trick - an Overseer trick! But I won't fall for it - I'm a good Gondian.
2.context: NodeContext: scared, not meeting players eyes, hands over face

3.speaker: Gondian Clore Falson
3.text: The Titan - it's angry you helped me. Do you hear it? Do you feel it?
3.context: NodeContext: traumatised, out of it, almost like she's in her own world. Someone who has been hurt so badly that she's almost on another world (the titan is a huge, terrifying steel watcher in the other room - she saw it kill a number of her friends)
